Trade/Device Name(s): VivaChek Link Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System
VivaChek Link Plus Blood Glucose Meter
VivaChek Ino Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VivaChek Link Plus Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VivaChek Link Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood using amperometric detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertips for persons with diabetes to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; for self-testing outside the body (in vitro diagnostic use), not for neonatal use or diagnosis/screening of diabetes, and not to be shared between users.
